directions: Puree the raspberries in a food processor, blender or immersion blender. Press the puree through a fine-mesh strainer with the back of a spoon, removing the seeds. Heat the puree in a small pot with the sugar and cornstarch until mixture boils, stirring constantly. As it boils, it should quickly thicken.
Let it cool complete before spreading it thinly over three layers.
ingredient_list: 1 1/2 cups (aprox. 130 grams; weights vary between brands) unsweetened cocoa powder (not Dutch process)
1 pound (455 grams) fine-quality semisweet chocolate such as Callebaut
1/2 stick (1/4 cup or 55 grams) unsalted butter
title: double chocolate layer cake
